## Explanation

This file is used with the sole purpose of downloading the airbnb listings data from inside airbnb (http://insideairbnb.com/index.html) and saving it on the local repository for further changes.

```{r}
airbnb_listings <- read.csv("http://data.insideairbnb.com/the-netherlands/north-holland/amsterdam/2021-12-05/visualisations/listings.csv")
write.csv(airbnb_listings, "../data/airbnb_listings.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
